Title: Silverlight Report
Description:
Open-Source Silverlight Reporting Engine.
This project allows you to create and print reports using Silverlight 4.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This project allows you to create and print reports using Silverlight 4, you can create reports using XAML. It supports ReportBand (Include ReportHeader, TopMargin, PageHeader, Detail, PageFooter, BottomMargin, ReportFooter, etc.). Use ReportBand, you can create a very flexible report. It also supports Binding and more.

Attention: This is a very early alpha version not intented to be used in production environments.
